name: CL_CLM_GRP
description: The CL_CLM_GRP table is the master table for whole claim component group (CMC) records. These whole claim component group records are often networked from Vendor-Network Contract or Benefit Package tables.

columns.name: CLM_GRP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the whole claim component group.

columns.name: COMP_GRP_NAME
columns.description: The name for the whole claim component group.

columns.name: DESCRIPTION
columns.description: The description of the whole claim component group.
